title: The Unsolved Murder of Beverly Lynn Smith
overview: The Unsolved Murder of Beverly Lynn Smith, a true-crime docuseries that follows the cold case and controversial investigation into the murder of Beverly Lynn Smith in her home in Oshawa, Ontario. Woven together from firsthand accounts, expert interviews, family archives, and rare access to key participants. It's an unpredictable tale that explores the unrelenting enigma of ethics and accountability in this provocative criminal case.
